availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Kennett (hotel keeper and farmer, Pendleton County)

body.p: Falmouth, Kentucky, hotel keeper and farmer. Married to Sarah A. Kennett. Hotel keeper and farmer in Falmouth, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton, Falmouth, p. 5. Find A Grave, “James N. Kennett (December 20, 1813-December 3, 1880),” Memorial #92416127, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Kennett&GSfn=James&GSmn=N&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=92416127&df=all& (accessed June 4, 2017).
